inputs.text: A close-up portrait of a young character with long yellow hair, simple and flowing. The character wears a plain white oversized shirt with a subtle view of the black shirt underneath near the neckline. The focus is on the face, capturing natural features with soft lighting and minimal shadows. The art style reflects a clean, hand-drawn sketch aesthetic, inspired by the design from the reference, emphasizing simplicity and casualness. The background is minimal, ensuring full focus remains on the character's face and hair.
